mapper.select:
select distinct top 100 PP_ProductPO.ID,PP_ProductPO.cCode, convert(varchar(50),PP_ProductPO.dDate,23) as dDate,Department.cDepName, PP_ProductPO.cMemo from PP_ProductPO left join PP_POMain on PP_POMain.ID=PP_ProductPO.ID left join Department on Department.cDepCode=PP_ProductPO.cDepCode left join PP_PODetails on PP_PODetails.MainID=PP_POMain.MainID
and PP_POMain.fQuantity > PP_POMain.fInQuantity
and PP_PODetails.fQuantity > PP_PODetails.fOutQuantity
and PP_ProductPO.ID < #{endId}
and PP_ProductPO.cDepCode = (select cDepCode from Department where Department.cDepName=#{cDepName})
and PP_POMain.cDefine22=#{productionCode}
order by PP_ProductPO.ID desc

choose.when:
select PP_ProductPO.cCode as cMPoCode, PP_ProductPO.cVerifier as cHandler, PP_ProductPO.cMemo, PP_ProductPO.dCheckDate as dVeriDate, PP_ProductPO.ID as iproorderid, PP_POMain.cInvCode as cPsPcode
from PP_ProductPO left join PP_POMain on PP_ProductPO.ID=PP_POMain.ID where PP_POMain.MainId=#{ppInMainId}

select cCode as cMPoCode, PP_ProductPO.ID as iproorderid, PP_POMain.cInvCode as cPsPcode, PP_POMain.fQuantity as iMQuantity from PP_ProductPO left join PP_POMain on PP_POMain.ID=PP_ProductPO.ID where PP_POMain.MainId=#{ppOutMainId}
